fundex.pdesc: Fund-Ex is an all-in-one loan application platform with client and server-side rendering. Apply for and manage personal, home, business, and education loans seamlessly.

features.keyfeature: Apply for personal, home, business, and education loans, offering users a diverse range of financial solutions.
features.keyfeature2: Streamline the loan application process with an intuitive and user-friendly interface, ensuring a hassle-free experience
features.keyfeature3: Implement automated notifications to keep users informed about application updates, approvals, and any additional requirements
features.keyfeature4: Integrate a loan calculator to help users estimate monthly payments, interest rates, and the overall cost of the loan
